channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pro-Palestinian protests disrupt colleges across the US
item.description: Pro-Palestinian protests are disrupting major US universities, and several schools have called police to remove demonstrators. Follow for live updates.

item.title: Man under influence of alcohol injured after kicking bison in the leg at Yellowstone
item.description: A 40-year-old who allegedly kicked a bison in the leg while under the influence of alcohol at Yellowstone National Park, was injured by the animal and arrested.

item.title: Columbia begins suspending student protesters
item.description: The deadline set by Columbia University for demonstrators to vacate an encampment there or face suspension has passed. Follow for live updates.

item.title: 'No one should be left behind': WNBA's Griner reflects on freedom from Russian prison
item.description: WNBA star Brittney Griner reflected on learning she was going to be released from Russian prison and voiced her support for bringing other Americans home.

item.title: Mark David Chapman Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Mark David Chapman Fast Facts and learn more about the life of the man who killed musician John Lennon.

item.title: 4 law enforcement officials killed, 4 injured in Charlotte, while serving warrants
item.description: Four members of law enforcement were shot and killed and four were wounded while they attempted to serve two warrants in Charlotte, North Carolina, police said Monday.

item.title: April 28, 2024 - US university protests
item.description: Pro-Palestinian protests continue at major US universities, and several schools have called police to remove demonstrators.

item.title: 77-year-old great-grandmother who stopped a robbery is running for City Council
item.description: In 2022, Faye Taylor went viral for stopping a robbery outside of her West Oakland home. Now, she is running for a spot on the city council.

item.title: April 27, 2024 - Campus protest updates
item.description: Pro-Palestinian protests continue at major US universities, where several schools have called police on protesters, leading to the arrests of hundreds across the country. Follow for live updates.

item.title: Man with sword arrested after multiple people stabbed near London tube station
item.description: A man has been arrested after driving a car into a home in east London before getting out and attacking members of the public with a sword, according to police.
